metadata.title: Mohammad Kikhia | My Portfolio
metadata.description: Mohammad Kikhia is a professional frontend web developer from Syria, specializing in ReactJS and NextJS. With a strong focus on user experience and interactive design, I create efficient and innovative web solutions. Explore my portfolio to see my work and learn more about my expertise in modern web technologies.

about.subtext: As a dedicated ReactJS-NextJS developer with three years of experience, I bring a passion for coding and a year of hands-on freelance experience to the table. I take pride in creating digital solutions that are not only functional but also beautifully crafted with love.
